item.title: Hands-on with Python
item.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language that is widely used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and other applications. It has a clean syntax and is easy to learn, making it a great choice for beginners as well as experienced developers. Here’s a quick overview from Fireship.io. Overview Variables and Data Types In Python, variables are used to store values such as numbers, strings, and other data types.
